Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Albergo Hotel in Schoenefeld, you'll be connected to the airport and within the vicinity of Kopenick Palace and Kindl-Buhne Wuhlheide. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of FEZ Berlin and Stadion An der Alten Forsterei.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 50 guestrooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include complimentary newspapers, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (complimentary) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a sauna, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request), and a train station pick-up service is also provided at no charge.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

When you stay at Albergo Hotel in Schoenefeld, you'll be connected to the airport and within the vicinity of Kopenick Palace and Kindl-Buhne Wuhlheide. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of FEZ Berlin and Stadion An der Alten Forsterei.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kopenick Palace - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Kindl-Buhne Wuhlheide - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
FEZ Berlin - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Stadion An der Alten Forsterei - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Treptower Park - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi
Tierpark Berlin - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Friedrichsfelde Palace - 13 km / 8.1 mi
Columbiahalle - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Tempelhof Park - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Event Center Tempelhof Airport - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
Oberbaum Bridge - 13.3 km / 8.3 mi
East Side Gallery - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
O2 World - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Viktoriapark - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Stasi Museum Berlin - 14.1 km / 8.8 mi

The preferred airport for Albergo Hotel is Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Albergo Hotel is Berlin (SXF-Schonefeld) - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi.
